name: jackcompiler
description: Jack Language Compiler II: Code Generator

scripts.cleanall: npm run clean && npm run cleanxml && npm run cleanvm && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.cleanxml: rm -rf files/Seven/*.xml && rm -rf files/ConvertToBin/*.xml && rm -rf files/Square/*.xml && rm -rf files/Average/*.xml && rm -rf files/Pong/*.xml && rm -rf files/ComplexArrays/*.xml
scripts.cleanvm: rm -rf files/Seven/*.vm && rm -rf files/ConvertToBin/*.vm && rm -rf files/Square/*.vm && rm -rf files/Average/*.vm && rm -rf files/Pong/*.vm && rm -rf files/ComplexArrays/*.vm
scripts.runall: npm run start files/Seven && npm run start files/ConvertToBin && npm run start files/Square && npm run start files/Average && npm run start files/Pong && npm run start files/ComplexArrays
scripts.runsome: npm run start files/Seven && npm run start files/ConvertToBin && npm run start files/Square && npm run start files/Average

author: David Lin
